Name: Weight Qualifier
Notes: Code defining the type of weight
Remarks: P0102: If either CD3-01 or CD3-02 is present, then the other is required

Name: Service Standard
Notes: To report the time period of carrier's standard service for the shipment

Name: Service Level Code
Notes: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier

Name: Pick-up or Delivery Code
Notes: Specifies the location or type of pickup or delivery

Name: Rate/Value Qualifier
Notes: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value
Remarks: P0708: If either CD3-07 or CD3-08 is present, then the other is required

Name: Charge
Notes: For a line item: freight or special charge; for the total invoice: the total charges -- expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified
Remarks: CD308 is the charge for the single package.

Name: Rate/Value Qualifier
Notes: Code qualifying how to extend charges or interpret value
Remarks: P0910: If either CD3-09 or CD3-10 is present, then the other is required

Name: Charge
Notes: For a line item: freight or special charge; for the total invoice: the total charges -- expressed in the standard monetary denomination for the currency specified
Remarks: CD310 is the total charge for all of the packages.

Name: Service Level Code
Notes: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier
Remarks: C1105: If CD3-11 is present, then CD3-05 is required

Name: Service Level Code
Notes: Code indicating the level of transportation service or the billing service offered by the transportation carrier
Remarks: C1211: If CD3-12 is present, then CD3-11 is required

Name: Payment Method Code
Notes: Code identifying the method for the movement of payment instructions

Name: Country Code
Remarks:
C1405: If CD3-14 is present, then CD3-05 is required
CD314 is the country where the service is to be performed.
